metadata.jobDescription: OpenAI is hiring a Lead Product Manager. 8+ years experience in developer tools and API design. Strong technical background.

hero.status: Open to AI Product roles — Developer Tools | APIs | Technical Infrastructure
hero.subheadline: Technical Product Manager with 8+ years shipping developer-first APIs and tools, from Microsoft's first blockchain APIs to Web3 infrastructure serving 1M+ daily requests.

about.tagline: Eight years building developer tools and API platforms, with deep technical expertise in architecting systems that developers actually love to use. Ready to bring that craft to AI infrastructure.
bio:
I've spent my career at the intersection of cutting-edge technology and developer experience—shipping APIs at Ankr that serve 1M+ daily requests, building developer tools like Flow Playground that improved onboarding by 60%, and architecting technical infrastructure that scales from prototype to production.
From Microsoft's first enterprise blockchain APIs to Web3 developer platforms, I've consistently focused on making complex technical capabilities accessible through elegant APIs and tools. Eight years of technical product leadership has taught me that the best developer products are built by PMs who understand both the underlying technology and the developer workflow.
